channel.title: Campaigns on Suyam | Suyam Charity template
channel.description: Recent content in Campaigns on Suyam | Suyam Charity template

item.title: COVID-19 Relief
item.description: Muthuram, Founder Trustee of Suyam created this Campaign to support families and children who are affected by COVID-19 lock down and it’s direct and indirect challenges.

item.title: Siragu Montessori School
item.description: Our Siragu school was established in 2003 to give FREE EDUCATION to the most underprivileged Children.

item.title: Sponsor a Child's Education
item.description: SUYAM Charitable Trust was started and formally registered under Trust Act (Regn.

item.title: Sponsor a Meal
item.description: Sponsor A Meal campagin initiated by Suyam through its Founder Trustee, Muthuram, with an aim to raise contributions by special feeding programs to feed the residential children and deserving day scholars of Siragu Montessori School and Bharathamatha School.

item.title: Sponsor a Teacher at Siragu
item.description: Teachers play a vital role in every school. In Siragu, every teacher is special as they deal the most disadvantaged deprived children rescued from begging, child labor and various other communities.

item.title: Sponsor Diwali 2020
item.description: Through this campaign we plan to raise contributions which can support Diwali expenses.

item.title: Sponsor our Bharathamatha school
item.description: Bharathamatha Nursery & Primary School situated in Vyasarpadi, owned & managed by Suyam.
